data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.description: Country in which to calculate ProtConn. Must be capitalized. List of available countries here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/country_list_country_list_get.
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.label: Country

data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.description: State or province in which to calculate ProtConn. List of available states/provinces here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/state_list_state_list_get. If left blank, will calculate ProtConn for the whole country.
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.label: State/Province

data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.description: File path of the study area of interest (leave blank if using data from WDPA)
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|studya.label: Study area file

data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|protec.description: File path of the shapefile of protected areas (Leave blank if using data from WDPA)
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|protec.label: Protected areas file

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Numerical value referring to the EPSG code (European Petroleum Survey Group) associated with the spatial reference system that will be used as a reference for the study area. This numerical value specifies the projection and geodetic datum used to define the coordinates and spatial representation of the data in the study area. For further information on coordinate systems and EPSG codes, you can access the official database on the EPSG website at https://epsg.org/home.html. The website provides documentation, resources, and tools for searching and understanding the EPSG codes used in various geospatial contexts.
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Study area EPSG

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Refers to the threshold distance used to estimate if the areas are connected in a spatial analysis. This threshold represent the median dispersal probability (i.e. where the dispersal probabilty between patches is 0.5). Dispersal probability is calculated with an exponential decay function with increasing distance.
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Distance analysis threshold

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: String value that defines whether the user wants to use a distance matrix of centroids or the nearest edge for the ProtConn calculation
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Type of distance matrix

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Name of the column in the protected area file that specifies when the PA was created (STATUS_YR for WDPA data)
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Date column name

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Year for which you want ProtConn calculated (e.g. an input of 2000 will calculate ProtConn for only PAs that were designated before the year 2000)
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Year for cutoff

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Year for the time series plot to start
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Start year

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Year interval for the time series plot of ProtConn values (e.g. an input of 10 will calculate ProtConn for every 10 years)
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Year interval

pipeline@35.label: Transboundary distance
pipeline@35.description: Distance (in meters) beyond the boundary of the study area to be included in the ProtConn index. Protected areas within this distance of the edge of the study area will be included in the calculation of ProtConn. A transboundary distance of 0 will only include protected areas in the study area.

data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|study_.description: Represents the map of the study area
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|study_.label: Polygon of study area

data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|protec.description: Represents the map of the protected areas within the study area
data>getProtectedAreasWDPA.yml@30|protec.label: Polygon of protected areas

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Contains the results of the connectivity analysis between the spatial units within the study area. This table provides valuable information about the spatial relationships and connectivity patterns among different spatial entities
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Protcon results

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Donut plot of the percentage of total area that is protected and percentage of the total area that is protected and connected
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Result plot

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Table of the time series of ProtConn and ProtUnconn values, calculated at the time interval that is specified
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: Year result

protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.description: Plot of ProtConn calcuated with three common dispersal values, 1km, 10km, and 100km
protcon_analysis>protcon_analysis_packag.label: ProtConn plot with dispersal presets
